channel.title: fina'tinas on My Chamoru Language Journey
channel.description: Recent content in fina'tinas on My Chamoru Language Journey

item.title: Mama'titinas Diksionårion Chamoru
item.description: Håfa adai todus hamyu guennao huyung ni' tumataitai esti! It’s been over a month-and-a-half since I’ve blogged and not a week has gone by where I thought to myself, “ai adai, debi di bai fa’tinas otru na blog”, but honestly my schedule has just been todu machalapon. I had to take a step back from dang near everything and reasses my priorities and how I spend my time outside of work - hence my absence 😅.

item.title: Mama'titinas Trongkun Manggåfa
item.description: I’ve been on a journey to document my family tree in a tech-saavy way. It started off simple: try and find out who my great-grandparents were. I honestly didn’t think I’d get past that because before this I couldn’t even tell you the names of any of my great-grandparents. But as you’ll soon find out, my simple task turned into a research-heavy adventure which is still ongoing. This wasn’t on my to-do list until recently - I’d say within the last 2 years.

item.title: Kasiyas 2020
item.description: Hu tugi' ini na poem para Kasiyas 2020; put hu sohyu' todus hamyu para konsigi fumino' Chamoru. Yanggen malago' hao umegga', siña hao gi Facebook –> click here (manaitai yu' gi ~45 minutes 👍🏼) — translation below poem Fino' Chamoru Mungnga ma’å’ñao fumino’ Chamoru, Achokka’ ennao muna’ma’å’ñao hao. Achokka’ hinasso-mu na mapput para hågu, Maolekña kumekefino' ki pumåpara Siña un tutuhun på’gu na ha’åni, Lao maolek ha’ yanggen ti siña hao.
